author: 流星のンツ
text:
面白かったー！おつるし〜



多分ほとんど気にしてる人いないと思うので下に書いておきます。
生で見てる時に｢おつるし〜｣ってコメントしようとしたら間違えて｢おつなきりー｣って癖で打ってしまいました。鳩とかが問題になっているのでこれも良くないと思いますしそのコメがたまたま目にとまって不快に思った方がいるかなと思いました。。。るしあちゃん、ふぁんでっどの方々、すみませんでした🙇‍♂️あとこれからも応援しています！

あ、百鬼組ではあるけどるしあさんも推してるのです

author: Nexcell Pride
text:
Part deux (Or part two) of this stream.
For some reason, global streaming started at 2:30 p.m. (Japan time)

Problems still continued :_しょぼん:
But when restarted again, at least Minecraft ran correctly.

At 34:59, the potion making starts... But not only made potions, also poisons.
Also tried to test the poison inside house, but not only poisoned temporarily herself, also the cat, but fortunately they were safe.

And outside, Rushia-hime in a Sylvester Stallone's "Rambo" style attacked an entire villagers army using the Trinitrotoluene and fire arrow combo, and as a piece of cake, made arson attack at their fortress... :_ちょうちょ:

But something bad happened... Cattle dissapeared... :_おこなのです:

Normal stream had a bad ending, the Superchat reading was too short and no after ending shown :_あせり:

We have to take care of our princess necromancer... She need us as we need her.

author: Denpo『デンポ』
text: Wait what happened? Im in my class when she streamed T.T

@alex  we don't know, everything seemed normal while she was playing, but while reading SC she looked kinda down and she didn't do the "post-credit scene" she always does. Wasn't around for the whole thing unfortunately, my connection was bugging me, but apparently she got a call or something on her phone? That might be it, anyways, I'll have to watch the archive of the collab she had with Mio Mama and the others to see if she looked fine there.
